item.title: Game 3: The timid gambit
item.description:
Summary

My opponent played a Smith Morra Gambit but only to retreat the Queen to its initial square 4. I decided to transition to the Sicilian Dragon that I know well.

The game was decided by a poor piece placement from my opponent which openened for tactic possibilities.
